title: What does the film 'Coco' mean for the Latino community?
itunes:title: What does the film 'Coco' mean for the Latino community?
description: The film Coco has resonated with Latinos in the US who have been battered by the anti-Latino rhetoric coming out of the White House. Can a Pixar hit and it's loveable protagonist boost a community's self esteem?
itunes:summary: The film Coco has resonated with Latinos in the US who have been battered by the anti-Latino rhetoric coming out of the White House. Can a Pixar hit and it's loveable protagonist boost a community's self esteem?

author: webmaster@kcrw.org (KCRW)
